parameter.name: publicIDpattern
parameter.description: PublicID creation pattern for an origin created by RTDD.

parameter.name: onlyPreferredOrigin
parameter.description: Allow relocation of preferred origins only.

parameter.name: manualOrigin
parameter.description: Enables relocation of any manual origin. If false, only automatic origins are relocated.

parameter.name: workingDirectory
parameter.description: Defines the directory used for storing temporary processing files.

parameter.name: keepWorkingFiles
parameter.description: Do not delete temporary processing files from the working directory after the processing is completed.

parameter.name: hypoddPath
parameter.description: Path to hypodd executable.

parameter.name: activeProfiles
parameter.description: Defines a list of active profiles.

parameter.name: profileTimeAlive
parameter.description: Defines how long the profile data should be kept in memery (in seconds). This is useful to release memory (catalog waveform data) after a period of inactivity, but it means the waveforms will have to be reloaded whenever a new event occurs (i.e. it will take more time to relocate an origin). Set a negative value to keep the profile data always in memory.

parameter.name: cacheWaveforms
parameter.description: Save catalog waveforms to local disk to avoid reading them from the configured recordStream when a profile is loaded (see profileTimeAlive). Also the projected waveforms are saved (e.g. ZRT projection for S phase), which saves additional time when a profile is loaded. The waveforms are saved in the working directory and it is safe to delete them, if that's required for any reason. The waveforms will be then saved again on disk the next time the profile is loaded (they will be read again from the configured recordStream).

parameter.name: wakeupInterval
parameter.description: Specifies the interval in seconds to check/start scheduled operations. This is basically the time resolution for delayTimes option.

parameter.name: delayTimes
parameter.description: Specifies a delay time in seconds, relative to origin time, to trigger the processing. This can be a single value or a list of delay times. In case a list if provided, subsequent delay times are used only if a previous processing attempt fails. Example: "60, 120, 300, 3600"

parameter.name: logging
parameter.description: Enables/disables updating of a cron log file. This file will be created at ~/.seiscomp3/log/[appname].sched and contains information about the scheduled events and the processing queue. The file is updated each n seconds, where n = rtdd.cron.wakeupInterval.

struct.description: Defines a regional profile. Origins that fall in this region will use this configuration. If an origin falls in multiple profile regions, then the profile defined first will be used. The region check is not used for full catalog relocation (see --relocate-catalog command line option)

parameter.name: regionType
parameter.description: Type of region: RECTANGLE or CIRCLE

parameter.name: region
parameter.description: Defines the region values. If regionType is RECTANGLE then 4 values (min_lat, min_lon, max_lat, max_lon) are expected. If regionType is CIRCLE then 3 values are expected (lat, lon, radius in km). If region is empty, then it will represent a region that matches any origin.

parameter.name: earthModelID
parameter.description: earthModelID that is stored in the created origin.

parameter.name: methodID
parameter.description: methodID that is stored in the created origin.

group.name: catalog
group.description: The files used to define a background catalog. New origins will be relocated using this catalog, which must contains high quality locations. In full catalog relocation mode (see --relocate-catalog command line option) this is the catalog that will be relocated. There are two ways to define a catalog: one is providing an event file containing the ids of existing events or origins; the second way consists in providing extended information (useful when the events are not in the database) and three files are required event, phase and stations. The files must be in csv format with the first line containing the column names. Each file requires a minimum set of columns, which can appear in any order. Additional columns can be present and will not be used but are allowed for informationl purpose.

parameter.name: eventFile
parameter.description: Path to event file to be used for this profile. Required columns: seiscompId (this must be a valide seiscomp3 origin id or event id) Extended format columns: id,isotime,latitude,longitude,depth,magnitude,horiz_err,depth_err,tt_residual If the extended format is used, then the phase and station files must be provided. Conversely, if the format used is the one with seiscompId, no other files have to be provided and the event information will be fetched from the database.

parameter.name: phaFile
parameter.description: Path to catalog picks file to be used for this profile Required columns: eventId,stationId,isotime,weight,type,networkcode,stationcode,locationCode,channelCode

parameter.name: stationFile
parameter.description: Path to the stations file to be used for this profile Required columns: id,latitude,longitude,elevation,networkcode,stationcode

parameter.name: P-Phases
parameter.description: Defines a priority list of accepted P phases. Phases not in the list will be discarded. if multiple phases exist for the same event/station pair, the first one in the list will be used.

parameter.name: S-Phases
parameter.description: Defines a priority list of accepted S phases. Phases not in this list will be discarded. if multiple phases exist for the same event/station pair, the first one in the list will be used.

parameter.name: incrementalCatalogFile
parameter.description: Path to incremental catalog file. If this file is specified then every new origin relocated with this profile will be added to the incrementalCatalogFile and used as additional entry for the configured catalog. When scrtdd module starts it reads entries from the incrementalCatalogFile and add them to its configured background catalog. It is safe to edit this file when scrtdd is not running.

group.name: dtct
group.description: Step 1: location refiniment. Those options control the computation of differential travel time (no cross correlation of phases) for event pairs.

parameter.name: minWeight
parameter.description: Min phase weight required. Phases not satisfying this condition will not be used. Check disabled by default.

parameter.name: minESdist
parameter.description: Min distance (km) between event pair and station required. Phases belonging to stations not satisfyig this condition will not be used. Check disabled by default.

parameter.name: maxESdist
parameter.description: Max distance (km) between event pair and station allowed. Phases belonging to stations not satisfyig this condition will not be used. No limit by default.

parameter.name: minEStoIEratio
parameter.description: Min ratio between event-station distance and pair inter-event distance. Phases belonging to stations not satisfyig this condition will not be used. Check disabled by default.

parameter.name: maxIEdist
parameter.description: Max distance (km) between events in a pair allowed. Event pairs not satisfying this condition will not be used. No limit by default.

parameter.name: minDTperEvt
parameter.description: Min number of differential travel times (Including P+S) per event pair required. Event pairs not satisfying this condition will not be used. Check disabled by default.

parameter.name: minNumNeigh
parameter.description: Min number of neighboring events required. Events not satisfying this condition will not be used. Check disabled by default.

parameter.name: maxNumNeigh
parameter.description: Max number of neighbors used. Further events are discarded. No limit by default.

group.name: dtcc
group.description: Step 2: final relocation. . Those options control the computation of differential travel time (with cross correlation) for event pairs.

parameter.name: minWeight
parameter.description: Min phase weight required. Phases not satisfying this condition will not be used. Check disabled by default.

parameter.name: minESdist
parameter.description: Min distance (km) between event pair and station required. Phases belonging to stations not satisfyig this condition will not be used. Check disabled by default.

parameter.name: maxESdist
parameter.description: Max distance (km) between event pair and station allowed. Phases belonging to stations not satisfyig this condition will not be used. No limit by default.

parameter.name: minEStoIEratio
parameter.description: Min ratio between event-station distance and pair inter-event distance. Phases belonging to stations not satisfyig this condition will not be used. Check disabled by default.

parameter.name: maxIEdist
parameter.description: Max distance (km) between events in a pair allowed. Event pairs not satisfying this condition will not be used. No limit by default.

parameter.name: minDTperEvt
parameter.description: Min number of differential travel times (Including P+S) per event pair required. Event pairs not satisfying this condition will not be used. Check disabled by default.

parameter.name: minNumNeigh
parameter.description: Min number of neighboring events required. Events not satisfying this condition will not be used. Check disabled by default.

parameter.name: maxNumNeigh
parameter.description: Max number of neighbors used. Further events are discarded. No limit by default.

parameter.name: timeBeforePick
parameter.description: (secs)

parameter.name: timeAfterPick
parameter.description: (secs)

parameter.name: maxDelay
parameter.description: (secs)

parameter.name: minCCCoef

parameter.name: filterFmin

parameter.name: filterFmax

parameter.name: filterOrder

parameter.name: resampling

parameter.name: controlFile
parameter.description: Path to hypodd control file (e.g. some_path/hypoDD.inp). The input/output files will be replaced by SCRTDD with its own files. The values on those lines are not relevant.
